test case 1:

l1r1: 101110101100
l4r4: 001100111111
l_1r_1: 010100101100
l_4r_4: 100010100101

possible key:
L(K4) \in {0010, 1001};
R(K4) \in {1110, 0000};


test case 2:

l1r1: 100000010001
l4r4: 000100001000
l_1r_1: 011001010001
l_4r_4: 010011011000

possible key:
L(K4) \in { 1001, 1111}
R(K4) \in { 1110, 0101}

I found K4 = 10011110
K = 110100111 or 010100111
